title: The Inspirational Messenger: The 5 Pillars to Becoming Inspirational in Everything You Do
description: The Inspirational Messenger brings together the wisdom of the soul with the reality of humanity to teach people how to become authentic, choose their platform in life and leave the profound impact they are destined to leave. Filled with the rich heart and spirit of a true inspirational messenger, this book will invite you to step into your truth and inspire you to bring it out into the world in the most spectacular of ways. The Inspirational Messenger is a pocketbook that you can carry with you and call on for inspiration whenever you need it. It has been written for those people who see further and feel deeper than other human beings and who, until now, have felt greatly misunderstood. There is no doubt about it: The Inspirational Messenger will change your life - forever.
author: Emily Gowor
